description.lv1:
Acappella prioritizes gaining Notes of the same color, but when she has no Notes, she will gain one at random. After gaining 3 Notes, they will be consumed to grant one of the following buffs to allied units.
Red Notes: P. DMG Up (Moderate), lasts for 15 sec.
Blue Notes: M. DMG Up (Moderate), lasts for 15 sec.
Yellow Notes: CRIT Rate Up (Minor), lasts for 15 sec.

description.lv1:
When Stella's combat skills deal DMG to a target (except for her Talent) whose Stasis has not reached 50.0% of its Max HP, she deals an additional 120.0% ATK (Piercing DMG). HP lost from this DMG becomes additional Stasis.
When a unit with Stasis is defeated, Stella casts her Special again on the enemy with the most Stasis. Additionally, her next Ultimate costs 1 less Bloodsoul.
Stella's DMG increases based on a target's Stasis, up to a maximum of 30.0%.

When Timeless Aiona receives any form of HP recovery, the recovered HP is converted into a Shield equal to 100.0% of the recovery amount.
When Timeless Aiona inflicts HP Loss, she gains a Shield equal to 35.0% of the lost HP.

buffs.name: Shield
buffs.description: When receiving DMG, loses Shield Strength instead of HP. When receiving True DMG or Piercing DMG, loses Shield Strength equal to 200% of DMG taken. Shield cannot exceed 200% of Max HP.

tips.name: Effective Range
tips.description: DMG dealt by this Vassal varies with range. It increases by up to 50% at the farthest target while decreasing by up to 50% at the target nearby.

description.lv1: Channels for 15 sec, creating a Garden. During this time, all other allied units gain All DMG Taken Down (Minor), while Quinn gains All DMG Taken Down (Moderate), and shares 45.0% DMG taken by all allied units. description.lv1:
Agnes constructs a Projected Plane at a select position. After a brief delay, the Projected Plane will pull enemies inside the plane toward its center while inflicting Movement Speed Down and P. DEF Down (Moderate) for 5 sec. Once the Projected Plane is constructed, Agnes transforms her weapon and enters her Planar Regression state for 12 sec, hurling boomerangs at the Projected Plane, each dealing 250.0% ATK (P. DMG) to enemies within the Projected Plane.
Planar Regression changes her Meridian Tracing as: hurls a powerful boomerang at the Projected Plane, dealing 500.0% ATK (P. DMG) to enemies within.

buffs.name: Pull
buffs.description: Control: Strong. Displace. Target is pulled forward and unable to cast Ultimate, Special (Active), Basic ATK, or move during the effect.

buffs.name: Movement Speed Down
buffs.description: Reduces Movement Speed by 90.

buffs.name: P. DEF Down (Moderate)
buffs.description: P. DEF -25%. Does not stack with effects of the same type.

tips.name: Planar Regression
tips.description: Basic ATK turns into boomerang attacks, targeting enemies within the Projected Plane.

description.lv1: Lorelei transforms into her Siren Form, releasing mist for 11 sec, and Sleeping enemies won't wake up during this time. Then Lorelei Teleports behind the selected target, inflicting Sleep for 2 sec and dealing 700.0% ATK (M. DMG). Each enemy eliminated increases the duration of Siren Form by 5 sec. When the duration ends, Lorelei returns to her Base Form and Teleports back to her original position.

tips.name: War Golem
tips.description: Summon (1 max). Cannot move, and is not prioritized as a target. Performs Basic ATK against nearby enemies, triggering Special after 4 Basic ATKs that deals DMG to enemies within range and Stunning them. description.lv1:
This Ultimate has Overdrive.
Valora gains immunity to all control effects and rushes toward the farthest or selected enemy on Ludgard, dealing 200.0% ATK (P. DMG) to enemies along the path and applying Stun for 1 sec, then dealing 150.0% ATK (P. DMG) to the target and nearby enemies.
After her first rush, Valora Channels for 15 sec, during which she rushes toward the farthest enemy every 8 sec, dealing 200.0% ATK (P. DMG) to enemies along her path as well as the target. In this phase, enemies not yet affected by rush are prioritized. After each rush, deals 150.0% ATK (P. DMG) to enemies in a cone around the nearest target.
Each rush during her Ultimate leaves Hellfire on the ground for 15 sec, dealing 100.0% ATK (P. DMG) to enemies within range once every 1.5 sec.

buffs.name: Stun
buffs.description: Control: Strong. The carrier stops and remains unable to cast Ultimate, Special (Active), Basic ATKs, or move during the effect.

tips.name: Overdrive
tips.description: Ultimates can be cast when current Bloodsoul exceeds 50% of their cost, even if insufficient. Overdrive is triggered when casting an Ultimate that creates a Bloodsoul deficit. During Overdrive, only Ultimates with 0 Bloodsoul cost can be used, but the Bloodsoul recovery rate increases by 20%. Overdrive ends when Bloodsoul restores to 0.

tips.name: Rush
tips.description: Quickly moves towards selected target or direction. Cannot be targeted during this effect.

tips.name: Channel
tips.description: A channeled spell with a long cast time. Interruption cancels any effects.

description.lv1:
Valora increases her ATK and CRIT Rate based on the range of Hellfire, by up to 40.0%. All enemies within range of Hellfire gain Soul Burn.
When casting her Ultimate, Valora gains a Shield equal to 30.0% Max HP that lasts until her Ultimate ends. During this period, when any of Valora's Shields are broken, Valora becomes Untargetable for 2 sec.

buffs.name: Shield
buffs.description: When receiving DMG, loses Shield Strength instead of HP. When receiving True DMG or Piercing DMG, loses Shield Strength equal to 200% of DMG taken. Shield cannot exceed 200% of Max HP.

description.lv1:

buffs.description: Upon the carrier's death, all are converted into an equal number of Feathers of War for Seraphina, up to a maximum of 20 stacks.

description.lv1:
Set an enemy as the target and deals 3000.0% ATK (P. DMG), applying 2 stack(s) of Radiant Feather to the target and surrounding enemies. All Radiant Feathers on the field are then retrieved and converted into Feathers of War. Each stack of retrieved Radiant Feathers deals 200.0% ATK (P. DMG) to its carrier.
Finally, all Windchasers gain the CRIT DMG Up buff equal to 50.0% of Seraphina's Feathers of War for 12 sec.

description.lv1:
Gains 9 stacks of Scarlet Shade, then begins Channeling for 10 sec. Every 2000 sec, Livian deals 100.0% ATK (M. DMG) to a select enemy target while restoring HP equal to 80.0% of her ATK to allied Dusk's Devotion Vassals, additionally restoring 80.0% of her ATK to Alexi. If the current target cannot be selected, Livian automatically switches to the nearest enemy unit.
While Livian is Channeling, if an allied Dusk's Devotion Vassal casts their Ultimate, she grants them 4 stacks of Scarlet Shade for 10 sec.

tips.name: Piercing DMG
tips.description: A special type of DMG. When inflicted, it ignores a certain amount of P. DEF and M. DEF and deals 200% DMG to Shields. This DMG type is not affected by P. DMG and M. DMG related effects.

description.lv1:
Synergy: Lunar Vigil.
Triggers when HP Percentage falls below 60.0%. Gains Thunderflow for 10 sec. Can trigger 1 time(s) per battle.
Ethereal Joan accumulates Electro Capacity by dealing DMG. Dealing DMG equal to 1000.0% of her Base Max HP fills the Electro Capacity, entering Overcharge state for 18 sec. During this state, DMG dealt increases by 50.0%, and Special and Basic ATK coefficients increase by 1.5 times. After Ethereal Joan casts any skill, deals additional Piercing DMG equal to 20.0% of that skill's DMG to all enemies and applies 1 stack of Thunderbrand.
After Overcharge state ends, Electro Capacity accumulation restarts. There is a 6 sec cooldown before Overcharge state can be triggered again.

buffs.description: Takes M. DMG equal to 30 ATK from the caster once every 2 sec. Stacks up to 5 time(s).

Death: All DMG Taken Up (Minor).

description.lv1: Inflicts Cosmic Gaze on a selected enemy and enters a charging state for 8 sec. Upon completion, deals P. DMG to the target with Cosmic Gaze equal to 2200.0% ATK. description.lv1:
Talent: Effective Range.
When the battle begins, applies Stellar Legacy to other Windchaser members on the field.
After allied Vassals have cast Ultimate 5 times in total, the Blood Moon phase in this battle becomes Stellar Wrath. In addition to the original Blood Moon effects, it grants the Stellar Wrath effect to allies.

buffs.name: Stellar Legacy
buffs.description: Carrier gains ATK equal to 15% of Resurgent Setti's Base ATK. Gains an additional 1% whenever an enemy unit dies. This effect can trigger up to 3 times.

buffs.name: Stellar Wrath
buffs.description: When the carrier deals CRIT DMG, an additional P. DMG equal to 100% of the carrier's ATK is dealt. This effect can be triggered only once per sec.

tips.name: Effective Range
tips.description: DMG dealt by this Vassal varies with range. It increases by up to 50% at the farthest target while decreasing by up to 50% at the target nearby.
